tool_description: Translates alternative text to multiple languages while maintaining accessibility principles and cultural appropriateness.

preserve_length.description: Whether to maintain similar character length in translations

cultural_adaptation.description: Whether to adapt content for cultural appropriateness

error_messages: Invalid alt text: Provide valid alternative text to translate.
Invalid source language: Provide a valid language code (e.g., en-US, es-ES).
Invalid target languages: Provide 1-20 valid language codes in the array.
Translation service error: Unable to complete translation for one or more languages.
Length constraint violation: Unable to maintain length requirements for some translations.
usage: Provide alt_text, source_language, and target_languages array. Optionally set preserve_length and cultural_adaptation. The tool returns translations optimized for accessibility.

translations.description: Translated alt text for each target language

length_preserved.description: Whether length was preserved for each translation

cultural_notes.description: Cultural adaptation notes for each translation
